description: This week Tommy was feeling a little under the weather and wasn't able to speak well, So he decided to film this scene and leave everything up to your imagination.Max is a well hung and very Fit guy that loves to be in front of the camera. Max starts off in front of the mirror where he admires how well built AND well hung he is. Max also decides to take this scene into the shower where he washes off the sweat from a long day at work and at the gym.Max finally makes it back to the couch were he erupts one of the biggest loads we have seen to date on TommyDxxx all over his chest covering his ripped pecs and washboard abs.Enjoy!
title: Fit Max Masturbating Good
